text: Hrux phwk khea klaw wa “khea(muhammad) di plxm pæ lng xal ku rxa nkhu nma” (muhammad) cng klaw theid “dangnan phwk than cng na ma sak sib su reaa h thi thuk plxmpælng khun hı di xya ngxal kru xan læa phwk than cng reiyk phu thi mi khwam samarth nı hmu phwk than xun ca kxallxh(hı ma chwy) tha phwk than pen phwk saty cring
